meanings.definition: The quality of being adorable or worthy of love and affection.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's adorabilities melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: The baby's adorabilities were so irresistible that even grumpy people couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The kitten's adorabilities were like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The adorabilities of the little girl were so pure and genuine.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of possessing qualities that inspire adoration.
meanings.sent1: The adorabilities of the teddy bear made it a favorite among children.
meanings.sent2: The adorabilities of the baby elephant captured the hearts of all who saw it.
meanings.sent3: The adorabilities of the fluffy bunny were so enchanting that even the grumpiest person couldn't resist smiling.
meanings.sent4: The adorabilities of the newborn lamb were like a beacon of joy in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The adorabilities of the little boy were so endearing that he was loved by everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of displaying charm or cuteness that elicits affection from others.
meanings.sent1: Her adorabilities shone through in every smile and giggle.
meanings.sent2: The adorabilities of the kitten were impossible to resist.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's adorabilities were so contagious that even the grumpiest neighbor couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The adorabilities of the baby panda were like a magnet, drawing everyone closer.
meanings.sent5: The adorabilities of the little girl were like a gentle breeze on a hot summer day.
